Text: Curse you for having Protected WMAs for the entire Hellbilly Deluxe CD... Curse you! Oh well... I suppose it could be worse... I think. It could be password protected archives!
rob zombie is awesome....thanks so much for te upload....now i need to convert em to mp3 (^_^)
Please note that only 1 album is in WMA-format, rest is in FLAC-format. Don't know what that is? -> Don't bother with this download.

Thanks, 

songs in Hellbilly Deluxe album however, are DRM protected and im not able to play them..

Thx sowingmyseed

Anyone knows where to get their LIVE IN LJUBLJANA 1989 songs?

sowingmyseed: I love you. This is the most complete collection I can find. 
woodis: If you don't know what *.flac is, you're retarded. It's just a different compression style for a music file. Use converterlite or a similar program to change it from *.flac to *.mp3 or *.wma or whatever. 
Or use VLC to play the files as they are.
